program.name: esound
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-hpux*) CC="cc -Ae" CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ARGS="--enable-ipv6" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CC_LD_RT="-R" ARGS="--enable-ipv6" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" --with-audiofile \ --with-audiofile-prefix=${LIBAUDIOFILE} --sysconfdir=${_sysconfdir} \ ${TCPWRAP+--with-libwrap=${TCPWRAP}} --disable-dependency-tracking \ ${ARGS+${ARGS}} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
${SB_PATH_SHTOOL} subst -q -e "\ s!=-L\(\${exec_prefix}/lib\)!=\"-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1\"!" esd-config
for _pc in esound.pc; do ${SB_PATH_SHTOOL} subst -q -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!" ${_pc} done
